title: Web Address Archaeologist
description: Find complete web addresses with secure protocols and proper structure. These URLs must use secure connections and follow standard formatting rules.
solutionSummary: Uses anchors (^$) to match the entire string, requires 'https://' protocol, validates domain names with proper character classes and quantifiers, ensures domains don't start/end with hyphens, requires valid TLD with 2+ characters, and allows optional paths with non-whitespace characters.
